Name: debarking, hardwood, azobe | sawlog and veneer log, azobe, debarked, measured as solid wood | EN15804GD, U
Category: A:Agriculture, forestry and fishing/02:Forestry and logging/022:Logging/0220:Logging
Description: The dataset reflects a high technological standard for debarking. The transportation processes are average for transportation to Europe; transport distance however can vary. The high technological standard and legal operations of this dataset cannot be assumed to be representative for azobe harvesting. Site-specific data for debarking is not available but takes place before shipping the logs to Europe, thus European data for debarking pine used. The resulting bark is left to rot.
